description: Grants the user the ability to generate nearly indestructible barriers by crossing their fingers. The user becomes a Barrier Human, able to create defensive shields and offensive barrier constructs.

users.circumstances: Bartolomeo possessed this fruit before his debut; exact circumstances of consumption unknown

abilityReveals.description: User can create nearly indestructible barriers by crossing their fingers. The barriers are transparent and can block powerful attacks.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Bartolomeo is shown crossing his fingers in specific hand gestures, hinting at his barrier-creating ability without fully revealing it yet.

weaknesses.weakness: Can only create one barrier at a time
Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Barriers are nearly indestructible and can withstand extremely powerful attacks
strengths.description: The barriers generated can block attacks from even powerful opponents.

description: Allows the user to turn their body parts into springs, enabling high-speed bouncing attacks and enhanced mobility.

users.circumstances: Bellamy ate this fruit at some point before his debut in Jaya

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Enables high-velocity jumping attacks and enhanced mobility through spring-powered movements
strengths.description: Bellamy can use spring-based powers for his Spring Hopper attack technique.
